sfpowerscripts.pool.footprint.help: Total number of orgs present across all pools

sfpowerscripts.pool.available.help: Currently available unallocated orgs in a pool

sfpowerscripts.pool.inuse.help: Currently in-use orgs in a pool

sfpowerscripts.pool.help: Pool org counts unified across states via alias labels

sfpowerscripts.build.scheduled.packages.help: Number of package build jobs scheduled

sfpowerscripts.build.succeeded.packages.help: Number of package build jobs succeeded

sfpowerscripts.package.metadatacount.help: Total metadata members included in a package

sfpowerscripts.package.elapsed.time.help: Elapsed time for generic package operation in milliseconds

sfpowerscripts.package.creation.elapsed_.help: Elapsed time for package creation in milliseconds

sfpowerscripts.package.installation.elap.help: Elapsed time for package installation in milliseconds

sfpowerscripts.apextest.testtotal.time.help: Total elapsed time for all Apex tests in a run (milliseconds)

sfpowerscripts.apextest.command.time.help: Elapsed time of the Apex test command invocation (milliseconds)

sfpowerscripts.apextests.triggered.help: Number of Apex test executions triggered

sfpowerscripts.validate.duration.help: Total elapsed time of the validation process (milliseconds)

sfpowerscripts.validate.packages.schedul.help: Number of packages scheduled for validation

sfpowerscripts.validate.packages.succeed.help: Number of packages whose validation succeeded

sfpowerscripts.validate.packages.failed.help: Number of packages whose validation failed
